title: Hey Riot, Nasus Q still goes through Jax's E
body:
Just tested it in a custom

Mom's spaghetti

replies.body: There are a few on hits (6-10 from memory) that didn't get properly updated to respect the revised blind/dodge/block rules. Nasus Q is one of those, should be fixed in 5.23.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1ErFQgBj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-12T06:22:32.605+0000)
>
> There are a few on hits (6-10 from memory) that didn't get properly updated to respect the revised blind/dodge/block rules. Nasus Q is one of those, should be fixed in 5.23.

thats a pretty big slip up, isnt that something that should be dealt with asap? or possibly have the champ disabled until it is fixed? especially due to the fact that he's such a large issue if he gets to that point in a game? 

Does Nasus Q (and the other on hit champs that didnt get patched properly) get affected by teemo blind, or pantheon shield? or are they just all around broken atm?

If not, can we possibly have an ETA on 5.23? :\
Patches come out every two weeks
Nasus' Q worked as intended. It was negated by Pantheon's passive and Blinds before and ignored Jax' E because Nasus' Q was undodgeable.
since nasus is pretty much crapola tier right now this bug only makes him marginally viable in rare situations. I dont think its worth disabling

I still don't understand all the hate and explicit finger pointing at Nasus' Q after all.

It already got blocked by blinds (Just the whacky point to check when a AA hits or miss made it go through easily, got fixed later) and properly blocked by Pantheon's passive. It went through Jax' E because Nasus' Q is hardcoded to be undodgable which got never changed since the removal of Dodge as a purchaseble stat.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1ErFQgBj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-12T06:22:32.605+0000)
>
> There are a few on hits (6-10 from memory) that didn't get properly updated to respect the revised blind/dodge/block rules. Nasus Q is one of those, should be fixed in 5.23.

Still wondering about Mordekaiser's Q interaction  personally
Just throwing this out there -- is Yorick Q part of this? He wasn't including in the list in the patch notes. I haven't gotten a chance to try him yet, though.
